name: Delicious Braised Meatball
desc: A classic Liyue dish. Emerald green onions and the ruby red meatball complement each other perfectly, while exquisite and extraordinary knife skills make for a melt-in-your-mouth meatball, fatty but not greasy, guaranteed to have you praising it all week. Don't forget to clean your plate for good luck!

customize.name: Recipe: Braised Meatball
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Braised Meatball.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Bamboo Shoot
customize.desc: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Braised Meatball
customize.desc: A classic Liyue dish. Fatty and lean chunks of meat are mixed with crunchy bamboo shoots before being kneaded into a ball, fried, and then boiled. The finished dish is very popular, finding a place at home meals or banquets alike.

customize.name: Suspicious Braised Meatball
customize.desc: A classic Liyue dish. The round shape and fragrant aroma seem on point, but it proves overly dry once you taste it. Perhaps you used too much lean meat in this one?

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
